title: Light Circuit Safety Check
description: Given a directed graph of light wires, detect whether any cycle exists. Output "Danger" if there is a cycle; otherwise output "Safe".

method_signatures.java: public static String checkCircuit(int n, int[][] edges)
method_signatures.python: def check_circuit(n: int, edges: list[list[int]]) -> str
method_signatures.cpp: std::string checkCircuit(int n, const std::vector<std::vector<int>>& edges)

input_format: Line 1: integer n (nodes). Line 2: integer m (edges). Next m lines: edge u v (0-indexed).
